item.description:
Not sure I will be there due to conflict -- please join Sherris group
6:00 p.m. - 9:00 p.m. in Rockville Bank Park (near L.L.Bean)

Evergreen Walk is starting off their Summer outdoor concert series with the Savage Brothers. I've seen this band play several times(classic rock cover band), and they are one of the better local bands around, and always entertain.

Come join us for a picnic dinner (potluck, please bring something to share with others)
Concerts end at 9PM **Don't forget to bring a lawn chair, and bug spray!!**

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Savage Brothers outdoor concert -- might rain I will post if cancelled
